# mapViewDidChangeVisibleRegion(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the map view’s visible region changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func mapViewDidChangeVisibleRegion(_ mapView: MKMapView)
```

## Parameters

- **mapView**: The map view with the visible region that changes.

## Discussion

Use this method to update the map in response to intermediate changes to the region. The map view calls this method each time the value of its visible region changes.



## Responding to map position changes

- **mapView(_:regionWillChangeAnimated:)**: Tells the delegate when the region the map view is displaying is about to change.
- **mapView(_:regionDidChangeAnimated:)**: Tells the delegate when the region the map view is displaying changes.
